view:descriptionText.ui:description: Thank you for your interest in volunteering for COVID-19 research. If you’re a U.S. Veteran, please answer the questions below and we’ll add you to our VA volunteer registry. If we think you may meet the criteria for a research study, we’ll contact you for a phone interview.

view:infoSharingText.ui:description: Note: We won’t share your information with anyone outside of VA. If you're not a  Veteran, you can volunteer through the  COVID-19 Prevention Network.

diagnosed.ui:title: Have ever been tested for and diagnosed with COVID-19?

closeContactPositive.ui:title: In the past month, have you been in close contact with anyone who tested positive for COVID-19?
closeContactPositive.ui:description: We define close contact as being within 6 feet of a person.

hospitalized.ui:title: In the past 6 months, have you been hospitalized at any time?

smokeOrVape.ui:title: Do you smoke or vape, or do you have a past history of smoking or vaping?

healthHistory.ui:title: Do you have a history of any of the health issues listed below?

AUTOIMMUNE_DISEASE.ui:title: Autoimmune disease (like rheumatoid arthritis or lupus)

IMMUNOCOMPROMISED.ui:title: Compromised immune system (including due to HIV/AIDS)

view:exposureRiskText.ui:description: Help us understand your COVID-19 exposure risk

employmentStatus.ui:title: Which work situation best describes you?

transportation.ui:title: How do you get to work?

residents.ui:title: How many people live in your home?

closeContact.ui:title: On most days, how many people do you have close contact with outside of those who live in your home?
closeContact.ui:description: We define close contact as being within 6 feet of a person.

ui:errorMessages.pattern: Please enter a valid 5- or 9-digit zip code (dashes allowed)

gender.ui:title: Current gender identity (please check all that apply)
gender.ui:description: Note: We ask for this information to help make sure we include a diverse range of people in our research studies.

GENDER_VARIANT.ui:title: Gender variant/nonbinary (neither exclusively female nor male)

raceEthnicityOrigin.ui:title: Race, ethnicity, and origin (please check all that apply)
raceEthnicityOrigin.ui:description: Note: We ask for this information to help make sure we include a diverse range of people in our research studies.

HAWAIIAN_PACIFIC_ISLANDER.ui:title: Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander

view:thankYouText.ui:description: Thank you for volunteering for COVID-19 research

view:textDetail.ui:description: We appreciate your commitment to helping others through this important research effort.

view:eligibilityTextHeader.ui:description: If we think you may meet the criteria for a research study

view:eligibileTextDetail.ui:description: Please understand that some studies have specific requirements and it may be weeks or months before there is an opening in a study for which you might qualify.  If we think there is a study you might qualify for, we will contact you.  This depends on available studies

view:eligibileTextNote.ui:description: Note: We’ll never ask for an ID number or for your financial, credit, or bank account information over the phone.

view:notEligibileTextHeader.ui:description: If we don’t think you meet the criteria for any studies

view:notEligibileTextDetail.ui:description: We won’t contact you. But we will keep your information in case new studies become available that you are eligible to join.
